title: Designer Profile: Karen Walker
content:
What’s your favourite colour?

Pink and purple and gold and black and white and silver and grey and also blue and also purple.

Karen Walker’s Spring ’13 eyewear collection was a glorious launch split into two halves: the first, modelled by elegant ladies aged between 65-92, and the second, by these little munchkins.

We always wanted to do sort of a bookend campaign about optimism,” Walker told Style.com. “The first shoot was based on eternal optimism, and the second part is about the open-eyed, playful optimism that kids bring.”

Optimism is right – after seeing these four, I have never been so optimistic about the style trailblazers of the future. Give it 15+ years and I can definitely see Tyler, Claudia, Elise and Alice-Rose forming a new ultra-hip Primrose Hill set, based in some currently off-the-radar pocket of Zone 2, stepping out with the likes of Suri Cruise and Apple and Moses Martin.

For more insight into the collection and campaign, go to https://www.karenwalkereyewear.com/ where you can read interviews with these super-trendy tykes. There are some real gems in there.
